short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bring the heat to your new tab with Charizard from Pokémon!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension features a fiery live wallpaper of Charizard in action, making your browsing experience both dynamic and exciting. Access your favorite websites quickly with popular site shortcuts, and personalize your new tab by adding custom shortcuts. Stay organized with the built-in calendar and clock, and easily search the web through your default search engine.

🖼️ Live Wallpaper: Watch Charizard’s fiery moves on your new tab.
🔗 Popular Site Shortcuts: Instantly access your most visited sites.
➕ Add Custom Shortcuts: Personalize with your own links.
🗓️ Calendar & Time: Stay on top of your schedule with a built-in calendar and clock.
🔍 Web Search Bar: Search the web easily using your default search engine.
Explore more extensions, view our Privacy Policy, or uninstall with ease via the provided links.
